name: Louis Garneau Felix II Snowshoes - Children to Youths
description: Sturdy, easy to put on, and crazy fun designs (sorry grown-ups – these are for kids only). Made for exploring hardpacked trails in flat terrain.Frames are lightweight, durable 6061-T6 anodized aluminum.Lightec decking is flexible down to -40°C.Carbon steel crampons provide excellent traction on crunchy snow.Reflex pivot point binding plates absorb shocks well and allow good foot rotation so kids can run around easily.Moulded bindings are designed with kids in mind, and have quick, easy-to-adjust ratchet systems.
